intro_only_event_multi_3.5_anniversary_l: Yeah!
I know you can keep the beat going!
I’m gonna dance!

We’re going to have a Pasio celebration
soon, right?

Marnie, your outfit flutters when you dance.
It’s really cute!
You look so good in it, too! I’m jealous!
Hehe, thanks!

Speaking of which, your outfit was inspired by
Moltres, right?
That’s right! Moltres is my dependable partner!
Moltres?
I suppose it’s different from the one I know?
Oh, that’s right, Shauna.

That’s because Galarian Moltres is different from
the Moltres we know.
Whoa! Really?

Yeah! They look alike, but their overall
characteristics and moves they’re good at
are very different.

Impressive! You really are an assistant Pokémon
Professor! Hop needs to up his game!
A celebration is happening on Pasio!
I wonder if there’ll be a feast.

Well, I guess it’s good to relax every once in a
while with events like this.
Hmph. Don’t rest too much, Hop.

There are a lot of Trainers who want to challenge
you now that you’ve become a Neo Champion...
Including us.
Sure!

You became a sync pair with Galarian
Zapdos, right?

I heard it’s different from the Zapdos we know.
Your Zapdos doesn’t fly much, right?
Yeah! My Zapdos is better at running than flying!

Because of that, it doesn’t like sitting still...
But that’s why I like it!

Its feathers crackle too, and it’s got a spiky head.
Kinda like...
Wh-what’re you looking at?
Wh-what’re you trying to say?!
A festival will happen soon on Pasio.

It’s just a chance for Articuno and I to shine
even brighter.
Hmph, I wonder...

Why don’t I test that—and see how strong these
Legendary Galarian Pokémon really are?
Oh dear. Are you sure you want to do that?

You’ll only be showing the world the miserable
defeat of that Rainbow Pokémon you’re so
proud of.
Oh yeah? Try me.
Hahaha! I like that!

You both talk pretty harsh... But firing up that
rivalry and competitive spirit is good.
Pasio’s future is bright for sure!
Blue, don’t just laugh! Stop them!

Don’t worry. If things get outta hand,
I’ll stop them.
Tsk...
I don’t like that carefree look on your face.
Oh no...
